strapiPost.title: U of A School of Art To Host Grand Opening Of Studio And Design Center
strapiPost.content:
The University of Arkansas's School of Art will host its Grand Opening of the new Studio and Design Center in the Windgate Art and Design District, on Saturday, May 6, from 10a-3p.

  • Creative hub: Made possible by over $40m in donations from the Windgate Charitable Support Foundation, the state-of-the-art, 154,000 sq-ft center is equipped to provide students a wide range of creative outlets through studio art programs, graphic design programs, and the new graduate Master of Design degree.
  • Grand opening: On May 6, guests are invited to tour the facility, view student art exhibitions, and purchase select student art. ARTsaga's will have a free citra-hopped brewed iced coffee while supplies last, and free Pedal Pops will be given to the first 100 guests.

Read more about the art school's new facility HERE.
